snippet: All 10 sectors in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose, led by oil and gas stocks.
abstract: Stocks rise briskly, ending three days of losses.
lead_paragraph: All 10 sectors in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose, led by oil and gas stocks.

headline.main: Market Moves Higher as Traders Shake Off Global Worries
headline.print_headline: Shares Rally to End Three Days of Losses
